dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3016047Y] Withdrawl of DMCA
dmca.body:
----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, February 09, 2007 12:51 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3016047Y] Withdrawl of DMCA ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Withdrawl of DMCA Added by system at Friday, Feb 9 2007 06:48 pm X-MailFrom: crookm@twcny.rr.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Feb 9 18:11:38 2007 Received: (qmail 8083 invoked by alias); 10 Feb 2007 00:11:38 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 8080 invoked from network); 10 Feb 2007 00:11:38 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 10 Feb 2007 00:11:38 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 9 Feb 2007 18:10:39 -0600 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 9 Feb 2007 18:10:39 -0600 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1171066233-21464-35-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from ms-smtp-04.nyroc.rr.com (ms-smtp-04.nyroc.rr.com [24.24.2.58]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id C672D5F793 for ; Fri, 9 Feb 2007 18:10:38 -0600 (CST) Received: from MCIP03 (cpe-74-71-115-28.twcny.res.rr.com [74.71.115.28]) by ms-smtp-04.nyroc.rr.com (8.13.6/8.13.6) with ESMTP id l1A0ALC9001828; Fri, 9 Feb 2007 19:10:22 -0500 (EST) Message-ID: <100c01c74ca7$d4da1560$0502a8c0@MCIP03> From: "Michael Crook" To: , Cc: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Withdrawl of DMCA Subject: Withdrawl of DMCA Date: Fri, 9 Feb 2007 19:10:10 -0500 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_1009_01C74C7D.EB409650" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.3028 X-MIMEOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-Virus-Scanned: Symantec AntiVirus Scan Engine X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: crookm@twcny.rr.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Feb 2007 00:10:39.0162 (UTC) FILETIME=[E52E61A0:01C74CA7] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) February 9, 2007 To Whom it May Concern: This is in regards to a DMCA complaint that was issued to you as the webmaster, OSP, or administrator, in reference to the following URL(s): http://www.guzer.com/videos/idiot_michael_crook.php At this time, I would like to withdraw the DMCA complaint, strictly as pertains to the above URL(s), which regard a 2005 appearance on the Fox News Channel. I request that the content therefore be restored, and the DMCA complaint withdrawn, and would like to at this time apologize for any extra work or problems that this complaint has caused. I certify that the above information is true and correct to the best of my knowledge, information, and belief, and may be reached via telephone at (201) 633-7820, or via postal mail at 8417 Oswego Road #179, Baldwinsville, NY 13027. E-mail is mcipdns@gmail.com. Thank you, Michael Crook MIME element (text/html)
February 9, 2007
 
To Whom it May Concern:
 
This is in regards to a DMCA complaint that was issued to you as the webmaster, OSP, or administrator, in reference to the following URL(s):
 
http://www.gu zer.com/videos/idiot_michael_crook.php
 
 
 
At this time,  I would like to withdraw the DMCA complaint, strictly as pertains to the above URL(s), which regard
a 2005 appearance on the Fox News Channel. 
 
I request that the content therefore be restored, and the DMCA complaint withdrawn, and would like to at this
time apologize for any extra work or problems that this complaint has caused.
 
I certify that the above information is true and correct to the best of my knowledge, information, and belief, and may be reached via telephone at (201) 633-7820, or via postal mail at 8417 Oswego Road #179, Baldwinsville, NY 13027.  E-mail is
mcipdns@gmail.com.
 
Thank you,
 
Michael Crook
MIME element (text/plain)
